Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Don't forget to write down your hints :)

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ganons Castle Spirit Trial)

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: @ tries to read the Gossip Stone...^${12 48 06}but he's standing on the wrong side of it!

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Ice Arrows#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern Push Block Silver Rupee Front Left

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path of time.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: ${12 68 79}They say that Zelda is a poor leader.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Bottom of the Well#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Bottom of the Well Basement)

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #4# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Heart Container# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Slingshot#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Huge Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Lobby Right Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Heart Container#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Iron Boots#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Recovery Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Market## has #1# major item.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Bottom Back Left

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #the Sun's Song#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #6# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Heart Container#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #Epona's Song#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Slingshot#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Arrows (5 pieces)# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Iron Boots#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Scythe Shortcut Silver Rupee Center Right

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Lens of Truth# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Huge Pit Silver Rupee Center
